actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to permit the mailing, broadcasting, or televising of lottery information and the transportation, mailing, and advertising of lottery tickets or any other materials concerning lotteries in interstate commerce, but only with respect to lotteries which are lawful in the State in which conducted.

summary.text: Permits the transportation, mailing, and broadcasting of advertising, information and materials concerning lotteries authorized by law and conducted by a State, the District of Columbia, or any territory or possession of the United States. (Adds 18 U.S.C. 1307; Amends 18 U.S.C. 1953, 39 U.S.C. 3005)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code to permit the mailing, broadcasting, or televising of lottery information and the transportation, mailing, and advertising of lottery tickets or any other materials concerning lotteries in interstate commerce, but only with respect to lotteries which are lawful in the State in which conducted.
